item.title: WhatsApp will curb the number of messages people and businesses can send without a response
item.description: WhatsApp is testing a way to limit number of messages someone can sending in a month without getting a response to limit spam

item.title: Apple and Formula 1 ink five-year US streaming deal, bringing all races to Apple TV
item.description: All practice, qualifying, Sprint sessions, and Grands Prix will be available to Apple TV subscribers.
